SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT review_num,review_writer,review_title,review_content,viewcount, TO_CHAR(review_regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS review_regdate, star, seller_space.space_name FROM review Inner Join seller_space on seller_space.space_num = review.space_num WHERE seller_space.space_num = #{space_num} ORDER BY review_num DESC) result1)
WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNum} AND rnum <= #{endRowNum}
